text: Xo phraphupenceakhxng phwk kha phraxngkh! Læa di pord prathan kæ phwk kha phraxngkh sing thi phraxngkh di sayya wi kæ phwk kha phraxngkh doy phan brrda rx sul khxng phraxngkh læa pord xya di thrng yang khwam xapys kæ phwk kha phraxngkh nı wan prlok ley thæcring phraxngkh nan mi thrng phid sayya
